item.title: I need help with Pvp Command
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

[font=Century Gothic][color=blue]Hey,

I think this should work, try it out. This should stop everyone from attacking, if you want to you can add a send message string in there too.

if (command.startsWith("pkon") && playerRights >= 3) { IsAttacking = false; AttackingOn = 0; resetAnimation(); IsUsingSkill = false; } if (command.startsWith("pkoff") && playerRights >= 3) { IsAttacking = false; AttackingOn = 1; resetAnimation(); IsUsingSkill = true; }

[font=Century Gothic]-Rich Dude99[/font]

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with Pvp Command

item.title: I need help with Pvp Command
item.dc:creator: @SheppehSays SheppehSays
item.description:
@SheppehSays wrote:

Can someone please help me get started with making a ::on and ::off
Like so.
if(command.startsWith(“On”) && playerRights >= 0){
sM(“You have turned pvp on”);
}
if(command.startsWith(“Off”) && playerRights >= 0){
sM(“You have turned pvp off”);
if(Player is fighting. I don’t know what to put here{
sM(“You cannot turn pvp off during combat”);
}

Ive never done anything involving Pvp so im not even sure where to start.
Anyhelp?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with Pvp Command
